articles.author: Fiachra Gallagher
articles.title: Gold rush for Ireland as Kellie Harrington, Amy Broadhurst and Aoife O'Rourke triumph at European Championship - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The three Irishwomen won their fights in Montenegro by unanimous decision.

articles.title: Concerns that new Covid-19 subvariant could lead to new surge - Leitrim Live
articles.description: Countries have been urged to remain vigilant about a new subvariant of Covid-19 which is expected to lead to a surge in the number of cases in the coming weeks.  The new variant has already been detected in Ireland.  The European Centre for Disease Control (E…

articles.author: Nick Wilson
articles.title: SA's brain drain may not be as bad as feared | Fin24 - News24
articles.description: While dinner party conversations and social media posts suggest wealthy South Africans are leaving for Europe, US and Australia in their droves, the actual data around emigration shows the reality may not be quite as bad as the public discourse suggests.
